MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich affecting properties in Wrenbury Heath Road, Sound Lane and surrounding area. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:01am. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10:08am on 20th October 2020
